lead_paragraph: Montpellier have signed former West Bromwich Albion midfielder Stephane Sessegnon on a two-year contract, the Ligue 1 club have said.

headline.print_headline: Montpellier Sign Former West Brom Midfielder Sessegnon
headline.main: Montpellier Sign Former West Brom Midfielder Sessegnon

snippet: Montpellier have signed former West Bromwich Albion midfielder Stephane Sessegnon on a two-year contract, the Ligue 1 club have said....
